backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law 820-2021 - 40-44 Mitchell Avenue

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 820-2021 to designate the property at 40-44 Mitchell Avenue (Ward 10 Spadina-Fort York) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: 2021.PB7.5 - Inclusion on the City of Toronto's Heritage Register 40-44 and 71-75 Mitchell Avenue and 735-737 and 753-755 Richmond Street West, and Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act - 40-44 Mitchell Avenue
